response.answer_text: As of now, Acer Laptops are for sure durable. I’ve been using this machine (Acer Aspire V5) for more than a year now & have encountered no durability problems or any other problem for that matter. I use my laptop quite roughly, (picking it up from the screen, etc..) and have found, no problems with it. However, I’d like to mention here (because I also repair laptops) that there has been an increase in the number of durability problems with these brands: HP, Dell, Lenovo. The problem with HP laptops is that the hinges in the LCD are broken easily, even with regular use (not rough one).The build quality of Lenovo & Dell laptops are poor. The body, internal structure, base, positioning of parts inside is bad.

I don't know about anywhere else in the world but if if you are in India, I suggest you to not go for Acer unless it's the gaming lineup. You will be considering the Acer because it's giving better specs than the HP, Dell and other manufacturers in the same price range but actually you are missing out the other important things like build quality, motherboard chipset, after sales service. I will tell you my personal experience with the Acer laptop: March 2018: bought an Acer Aspire 5 (515G) for 36K May 2018: Got the keyboard replaced in warrenty as some keys were not working. September 2018: Got the motherboard replaced, (board was dead) January 2019: Got the motherboard replaced again, this time, it was shutting down automatically. May 2019: automatic shutdown problem strikes again and now it was out of warrenty and I was busy so didn't get it repaired till Aug 6, 2019 25 Aug, 2019: same problem with motherboard and now the technician is saying to replace the motherboard which will cost 10–11 thousand. I asked him, why it's happening again and again and he said, it's the problem with Acer motherboard chipset, very poor quality hardware. And did I mention, for each warranty repair I had to wait for 30–45 days for the spares. And that's my experience, if you still want to buy Acer, go ahead. I hope your purchase will be better than mine

I make for sure that some of ACER laptops are durable. These durable ACER laptops often were produced for EU or US market with the reasonable budget. These laptop models is belong to high class laptops. Some good Acer laptop models are at high rankings such as Acer Spin and Acer Swift models. These laptop models are recommed by PCMag, WireCutter and Consumer Reports. Model Acer Spin 1 SP111-31-C2W3 is recommded for under $500 budget. There are two good Acer laptop models are under $800: AcerSwift 3 SF314-52-517Z; AcerSpin 5 SP515-51N-544J. On the other hand, Acer laptops is in very low rank as a research of a magazine (Best & Worst Laptop Brands 2018) Acer laptop has not a good hardware quality, so that is Acer may have not durability feature.  Some good laptop models from Acer  Acer Spin 3  Acer Spin 5  Acer Swift 3  Acer Swift 7

I recently bought acer Nitro 5 around 10 july 2020. Charger Was not Working, So i replaced the laptop and it took like 15 days just to replace it. After 2 week of smooth functioning the windows crashed. So, next day I reached out to service center and the next day Window was reinstalled but it was taking like 2 3 minutes to boot up and the employee of service center said that there is a problem with the hard disk and its need to be replaced. After like 2–3 hours the window got crashed again and it was showing no hard disk. So I spam Mail To acer and they send me to give my details. Now I am waiting for the reply for like a week and nothing came up. Now, I am bored in this lockdown because acer is not helping Much and i don't know how much they will take to replace it. So in my opinion its not durable if problems are coming up every two week.

This is my 6th year of using Acer Aspire V. Acer has excellent performance as I can do my assignment, work and play PC games effortlessly (The Sims 4, Sid Meier Civilisation 7, Tropico 6 & etc). It never really overheat. There are 3 problems that I encountered, My keyboard was not responsive during its’ first year. I sent it to the Acer centre to change it but the problem arose again during its’ second year.My speaker spoilt during my 4th half-year of using it (due to water accident).Now the base of my laptop disintegrates due to its’ plastic material and the loosened screw. So I need to be very careful when I’m using it. HahahaI think Acer did well in creating their laptop as it lasts for more than 5 years. I have no complaint except for their keyboard quality. After all, you can say that I’m a happy Acer user! I’m planning to buy their latest Swift 5 soon! Wish me luck!

Yes, Acer laptops are very durable. We get this question in our mind because of the cost of the product, it offers excellent deals at very low price.Actually, the bigger and faster predators series are from Acer, they are truly ahead of all brands.You can buy any acer product without a question, just check the specs and price, You will fall in love with it. It has all types of laptops like business, work, gaming etc. I am not a acer fan boy, but I truly believe that acer makes very durable products as I have seen it with my friends. Happy shopping !!

Yeah sure. I recommended you Acer Aspire 5. I work on computers. Mostly home and small business. Acer and it's brands Gateway and e-Machines are among the worst machines available. They are cheaply made, underconfigured and loaded with Crapware. I personally like ASUS and Lenovo.   Source: Best & Worst Laptop Brands 2015

Very shitty I must say. I mean my personal experience says something will break down very fast, in most cases, whether it is the speaker or the optical disk drive or maybe the keyboard. There was a time when couple of my friends bought because they were kind of cheap. But after couple months something minor got damaged and after one and a half year bigger things starts breaking down like display and cooling solution. So I would ask you to stay with better brands like Asus/Toshiba/Dell/HP. Good luck!

I have bought acer swift 3 with i5 8th gen and mx 150. The laptop is awesome and i loved it but after 4 months something went wrong with it and i rushed to service center and belive me it’s more than 2 months and they don’t have parts to replace with new one every time i ask they say we don’t have parts we are looking for it. Worst service ever. Please do not buy acer in INDIA. Fuck you acer.

Absolutely no. I bought an acer aspire i5 laptop (India) and the motherboard gave up just after exceeding the warranty period. The replacement of the motherboard was estimated to be 35k. Which was costlier than the price at which I bought it. Even CTC secunderabad technicians gave up saying that the components are unavailable. It's nothing but a piece of junk and has been lying around dead for about 1year now. NEVER BUY AN ACER, NEVER.. PERIOD.

You can’t generalize a specific answer to your question for every acer laptops. At low budgets, Acer truly offers some of the worst possible builds. As you start climbing up, build gets better with increasing cost, however it still doesn’t gives what you will expect from other brands at the same cost.

I love Acer laptops, the build quality on mine is very good and a previous Acer I had was poor. Asus I had before was pretty bad, very plastic and flimsy. Toshiba also bad. HP fan way too loud like a vuvuzela. Acer has been my go to brand. Though I think Lenovo is a decent brand too.
No , Acer after Service is very bad. I recommend you to never buy any product's from Acer. They deleted Customers problem from Twitter and Facebook page. Go with other brand and never buy from Acer.
Not upto the mark in quality for sure.    Source: Best & Worst Laptop Brands 2015
